languages.text: {n}При виде Арлекина Кассия хватается за голову, и кровь алыми струйками стекает по ее щекам.{/n} "Твои цвета, ксенос... изломаны и неправильны, словно преломляются сквозь искаженную призму! То, что должно быть привычно, — рассеивается. А чуждые оттенки все пляшут и пляшут в безумном танце..."

{n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."
languages.original_text: {n}При виде Арлекина Кассия хватается за голову, и кровь алыми струйками стекает по ее щекам.{/n} "Твои цвета, ксенос... изломаны и неправильны, словно преломляются сквозь искаженную призму! То, что должно быть привычно, — рассеивается. А чуждые оттенки все пляшут и пляшут в безумном танце..."

What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades will not stop twisting madly..."

{n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

languages.text: {n}カシアはハーレクインの姿を見て頭を抱え、緋色の血が頬を伝い始める。{/n}「異種族よ、あなたの色はまるで歪んだプリズムを通して屈折しているかのようだわ！あるべき姿がバラバラになって、まばゆい色合いは狂ったようにねじれまくっています…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはハーレクインの姿を見て頭を抱え、緋色の血が頬を伝い始める。{/n}「異種族よ、あなたの色はまるで歪んだプリズムを通して屈折しているかのようだわ！あるべき姿がバラバラになって、まばゆい色合いは狂ったようにねじれまくっています…」

languages.text: {n}卡西娅一看到丑角，就紧紧地捂住了头，鲜血顺着她的脸颊流下。{/n}“异形，你的颜色支离破碎，极其古怪！就好像是通过扭曲的棱镜折射出来的！原本该在一起的东西被打乱，令人眼花缭乱的阴影不停地扭曲着……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅一看到丑角，就紧紧地捂住了头，鲜血顺着她的脸颊流下。{/n}“异形，你的颜色支离破碎，极其古怪！就好像是通过扭曲的棱镜折射出来的！原本该在一起的东西被打乱，令人眼花缭乱的阴影不停地扭曲着……”

languages.text: {n}Cassia se agarra la cabeza al ver al Arlequín, y sangre escarlata empieza a correr por sus mejillas.{/n} «¡Tus colores, xenos, están fracturados e inconexos, como refractados a través de un prisma distorsionado! Lo que debería ser conocido está disperso. Y los matices deslumbrantes no dejan de retorcerse enloquecidos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se agarra la cabeza al ver al Arlequín, y sangre escarlata empieza a correr por sus mejillas.{/n} «¡Tus colores, xenos, están fracturados e inconexos, como refractados a través de un prisma distorsionado! Lo que debería ser conocido está disperso. Y los matices deslumbrantes no dejan de retorcerse enloquecidos...».

languages.text: {n}Als Cassia den Harlekin erblickt, hält sie sich den Kopf, und rotes Blut beginnt, ihre Wangen hinabzurinnen.{/n} "Eure Farben, Xenos, sind gebrochen und falsch, als würden sie durch ein verzerrtes Prisma scheinen! Was vertraut sein sollte, ist zerstreut. Und die blendenden Schattierungen tanzen und wirbeln wie verrückt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Cassia den Harlekin erblickt, hält sie sich den Kopf, und rotes Blut beginnt, ihre Wangen hinabzurinnen.{/n} "Eure Farben, Xenos, sind gebrochen und falsch, als würden sie durch ein verzerrtes Prisma scheinen! Was vertraut sein sollte, ist zerstreut. Und die blendenden Schattierungen tanzen und wirbeln wie verrückt ..."

languages.text: {n}À la vue de l'Arlequin, Cassia prend sa tête dans ses mains et des larmes écarlates se mettent à ruisseler sur ses joues.{/n} « Vos couleurs, xénos, sont fracturées et déformées, comme si elles étaient réfractées par un prisme difforme ! Ce qui devrait être uni est dispersé, et vos nuances aveuglantes tourbillonnent frénétiquement sans interruption... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

traits.locale_text: {n}À la vue de l'arlequin, Cassia prend sa tête dans ses mains et des larmes écarlates se mettent à ruisseler sur ses joues.{/n} « Vos couleurs, xénos, sont fracturées et déformées, comme si elles étaient réfractées par un prisme difforme ! Ce qui devrait être uni est dispersé, et vos nuances aveuglantes tourbillonnent frénétiquement sans interruption... »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, Arleken'i görür görmez başını avuçlarının arasına alıyor. Yanaklarından kızıl kan damlaları süzülmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Zeno... Renklerin, âdeta biçimsiz bir prizmadan geçerken kırılmışçasına paramparça ve yanlış! Aşina olunması gereken savrulup gitmiş. Göz kamaştıran tonlar ise çılgınlar gibi bükülüp durmaya son verecek gibi değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia clutches her head at the sight of the Harlequin and scarlet blood starts trickling down her cheeks.{/n} "Your colours, xenos, are fractured and wrong, as if refracted through a distorted prism! What should be familiar is dispersed. And the bedazzling shades won't stop twisting madly..."

Renklerin, âdeta biçimsiz bir prizmadan geçerken kırılmışçasına paramparça ve yanlış! Aşina olunması gereken savrulup gitmiş.
